Reviews.Title: Its...okay. Don't expect powerhouse performance here
Reviews.Author: Andrew Brandt
Reviews.Content: This is a very basic, low-level laptop. It's not necessarily bad, it's just not that great either. Loads slow, video buffers a lot and system stutters when browsing through panels in the W8 modern UI. Perhaps with a little more RAM it might run faster, but I don't want to have to upgrade a laptop right out of the box. If money is an issue, this will work, but you can probably find something perhaps $50 more that may be a bit better out of the box.

Reviews.Title: So Far So good
Reviews.Author: Charketa T. Buie "Ketaboo"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this on cyber Monday, received the laptop in 2 days...so far so good, I have to get use to Windows 8, but I love the format. The keyboard is slick, the laptop is light, easy to open and shut....Will give a later review after messing around with for a month or two.

Reviews.Title: worst purchase i ever made
Reviews.Author: beedadadoula
Reviews.Content: My old Dell's screen went out, so I began a search on which laptop would be as reliable but have more space. I purchased this laptop (toshiba satellite c855-ds5357) around November of 2012 - I am SHOCKED at how slowly it processes. I don't have it bogged down. I can have only one window open, but videos lag and look choppy. It takes me an hour to process a Fed Ex print order that used to take me only 5-10 minutes because page changes are S-l-O-W. Customer support was a joke - they told me 2 months ago that I didn't have a warranty. It was supposed to come with a 1 year - couldn't understand their CS Rep but I knew he was trying to sell me more stuff that I didn't need.  What I needed was a reliable computer that did what it was supposed to.It's pretty - but it's garbage.Run away folks. Bad news in Toshiba land.

Reviews.Title: Good, Bad, Good.
Reviews.Author: F. Me
Reviews.Content: Well, I got this laptop on Christmas and it was great...for about 3 months. I had a lot of applications on it and a lot of things downloaded from the internet. So a couple months ago I decided to reset it. It deleted all of my things, and now I believe I have about 10-15 things downloaded on the laptop and it works fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Hard Drive Failure months after purchase!
Reviews.Author: Bobbi
Reviews.Content: In less than FIVE MONTHS, this laptop suffered a complete hardware failure and I lost EVERYTHING!!!!!!  Very upset! I lost photos, resumes, cover letters, personal information.  I am very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba is the best
Reviews.Author: Ghost Rider
Reviews.Content: Windows 8 is less than perfect however, bought this as a gift, set it up with a classic start menu app and the OS is now tolerable.  The laptop is a great value for the price!

Reviews.Title: NEVER BUY ANOTHER
Reviews.Author: ray sepanski
Reviews.Content: I HAVE HAD NOTHING BUT TROUBLE WITH THIS PRODUCT, BECAUSE IT WAS A CHRISTMAS PRESENT BOUGHT IN NOV AND GIVEN AT CHRISTMAS BY TIME IT WAS FIRST USED THE 30 DAY WARRANTY FROM THE SELLER(AMAZON) HAD EXPIRED.  HAD TO GO TO THE TOSHIBA COMPANY FOR SERVICE, AND PAY FOR THE SHIPPING CONTAINER AND THE COST OF SHIPPING IT BACK TO THE REPAIR CENTER. (THEY HAD TO REPLACE THE HARDDRIVE) AFTER RECEIPT OF RETURNED REPAIR FOUND ANOTHER PROBLEM, REFUSED TO PAY AGAIN FOR SHIPPING AND THE COMPANY WOULD NOT ISSUE A REPAIR ORDER UNLESS I PREPAID THE SHIPPING, AND SO I AM STUCK WITH IT AS IS.  ON TOP OF ALL THIS, THE COMPUTER ITSELF IS NOT SUITED TO WINDOWS 8, BECAUSE IT IS NOT A TOUCH SCREEN.  BAD NEWS--NEVER AGAIN TOSHIBA.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: DX
Reviews.Content: Purchased this laptop for my fiancee who was not technically skilled. She loves it and it provides all that a novice needs. windows 8 o/s

Reviews.Title: It's ok....
Reviews.Author: Brittany Browning-Sano
Reviews.Content: It's pretty slow and most new laptops have Bluetooth and this does NOT. Shipped on time and customer service was good.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: Paperback Writer
Reviews.Content: I have a Toshiba laptop and when I saw I was going to give my daughter one Toshiba was a likely choice.  After comparing pc's on Amazon, I went with this model Toshiba based on my experience plus the available features and the best price available.My daughter tells me her experience on this product has been excellent and she is very happy with her Toshiba.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Elsa Rosenfeld
Reviews.Content: I have to get used to Windows 8, but other than that, the laptop itself is pretty good looking and came well packaged.

Reviews.Title: nothing but trouble
Reviews.Author: charles leathem
Reviews.Content: within one week, machine slowed to a non pace. then,  pages went off line. continued to jump pages. wouldnot respond to open pages. worst computer i have experienced!

Reviews.Title: bad product
Reviews.Author: David Jones
Reviews.Content: bought this as a christmas present,  opened it when received it and it worked,  present was for my finance and she has used it maybe 10-15 times in the last 3 weeks, and now the computer will not start up, goes to the toshiba screen then shuts down.  Not the experience i was hoping for when purchased, i have a toshiba and it works great but this one did not
